scripts.install:wc: yarn install && cd packages/admin && yarn install && cd ../plugin1 && yarn install && cd ../plugin2 && yarn install
scripts.reinstall:wc: rm -rf yarn.lock node_modules && yarn install && cd packages/admin && rm -rf yarn.lock node_modules .next && yarn install && cd ../plugin1 && rm -rf yarn.lock node_modules && yarn install && cd ../plugin2 && rm -rf yarn.lock node_modules && yarn install
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
